caption.p: King LT(S)-D ™ laryngeal tube (King Systems; Noblesville, IN, USA).

From Subramanian A, Garcia-Marcinkiewicz A, Brown D, et al. Definitive airway management of patients presenting with a pre-hospital inserted King LT(S)-D ™ laryngeal tube airway: a historical cohort study. Can J Anesth. 2016;63(3):275–82.
